click-hearth: by clicking on the heart icon.
cart-doesnt-exist: The cart you tried to access does not exist. Clear your cookies and try again.
check-this-products: You might also want to check out these products.
test-order-created: Your test order was successfully created!
complete-setting-up: You can now complete setting up your store in the admin.
sent-order-confirmation-to: We have sent the order confirmation details to
cant-find-email: If you can't locate it in your inbox, please wait a few minutes or retry again.

sign-in-with-new-password: You can sign in with your email and new password.
enter-new-password: Enter your new password in the form below.
